text: Hulaŋ 14.3 Sng 149.1, Ais 42.10, CHL 5.9, 7.4, 15.2-3 hekɨlɨ hekɨlɨ agɨlaŋ hula akuaba akuaba limu ahica limu ahica hɨhi hɨniavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ hula Asɨ dɨ mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ uvɨ heŋ hɨniavɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ nɨbɨlaŋ mavɨn lama hɨniavi heŋ lagulamavi uami. Lagulama sɨhɨ hɨhi agadɨ iahavi uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali 144,000 fɨli neŋ hɨniavɨdaci Asɨ nulɨdɨ likɨlami agɨlaŋ pam sɨhɨ hɨhi agadɨ igavɨlalɨ uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ ma igavɨlalɨ uami.
